ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Badger,Mark Nelson,Michael Ebert,Gary Martin,Michael Ebert,Mark Badger,Gary Martin
ComicInfo.Summary: The Masque by Mark Badger, Captain Crusader by Doom Patrol artist Gary Martin plus more Dinosaur Tales by Mark Nelson. ChaptersBabes 'n Arms: A giant robot attacks Honolulu. It's design is recognised by a young woman, Toschi, as one of her father's over at Kobe-Okada Aerodynamics. It has a major design flaw and Toschi knows just how to exploit it. Together with her friend, Sunny, a fistful of weapons and a couple of helicopter packs they set out to do just that. Though they'd rather be shopping. Masque: The C.I.A. continues to pursue Albert Montoya but is continually foiled by a Skull-masked, gun toting figure. Captain Crusader: A New York superhero aficionado emulates what he loves from the comic book pages on the streets of the city. He dresses up in a bright costume and helps people in distress as Captain Crusader. He's encouraged by some early success but quickly brought down to earth by a group of thugs he catches in the act of robbing an apartment.
ComicInfo.Title: Babes 'n Arms, Part 1; Masque (Part 4); Captain Crusader (Chapter I)
